summary: "The Graduate" is a 1967 American comedy-drama film about a 21-year-old college graduate, Benjamin Braddock, who is unsure about his future. He gets involved with an older married woman, Mrs. Robinson, but then falls in love with her daughter, Elaine. The movie was very successful, making a lot of money and winning awards. It's considered one of the greatest films ever made in the United States.
title: The Graduate
